name: Wild Ranker
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Everything in this world is ranked. In the quiet village of Tori lives a boy named Lowe. One day, his peaceful life is shattered when the village is destroyed by a mysterious force known only as the Island of the gods. Why was the village targeted? What secrets lie behind its destruction? Determined to uncover the truth, Lowe vows to set foot on the Island of the gods himself. But there&#039s a catchâ€”only adventurers ranked in the top 10 are allowed to enter the island. To achieve this, Low begi
